title: String Reversal and Validation
description: Create a function that takes a string as input and checks if it is a palindrome. If it is, the function should return the reversed string. If not, it should return a message stating that the input string is not a palindrome. The function should handle strings with spaces and special characters by ignoring them and considering only alphanumeric characters.
sample_input: A man, a plan, a canal: Panama
